title: 6.15 UPDATE NOTHING WORKS HELP!!
body: I have tried everything to update the game! nothing works i even deleted the game and installed it again everything mentioned in the boards that tried to fix the patch still is not helping me i just want to play a game with {{champion:268}}  and {{champion:157}} but mostly{{champion:64}} i just bought him and want to try him out! iam so sad and i hate watching all my friends online and am just sitting there. :(

replies.body: I fixed it by my self thx though :p

There are a number of reasons why you'd having issues patching. Most of the frequent causes are either system permissions issues or an unsteady connection to the server. When any number of those factors are affecting your patching, not only can they prevent you from patching properly, but they can cause the patcher to crash entirely. Our [patching issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) addresses the most common fixes for this issue. 

If you're still unable to patch successfully after working through that guide, please let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sBAe0J9d,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-28T18:08:34.387+0000)

NOTHING worked i dont believe it i also i tried everything on the guide!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
ok i will try the guide if it does not work i will let you know

We just have to wait until they patch it. I've tried everything and got 5 low priority games on top of that. 
I hope you own other games. Dota 2 is very similar.
so is there anyway to get out of he 5 game low priority due? Can riot remove it for us since its essentially their fault....
I do own other games but those games are all ps4 games and i moved away to visit my family for 2 months so i cant do nothing now i really want to play
